eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc

Class FoodCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc.FoodCalculator

  • public class FoodCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to calculate saturation of custom food items. Also handles effects like health regain based on lore.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    PlayerItemConsumeEvent

    • Method Detail

      • tryToConsume

        public static void tryToConsume(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Lets a player consume an item, if it is valid and the cooldown is ready. If it was a succes the item is removed and an eating sound is played.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who tries to consume the item.
        itemStack - The item the player tries to consume.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.playerFoodConsume(Player), applyItemEffects(Player, ItemStack)

      • applyItemEffects

        public static void applyItemEffects(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Applies status effects based on a consumed item's lore. This includes saturation, healing and status modifiers.
        Parameters:
        player - The player consuming the item.
        itemStack - The item the player consumes.
        See Also:
        FoodUtils
